site.title: Feathers - A framework for real-time applications and REST APIs
site.description: Feathers is a web-framework for creating real-time applications and REST APIs using JavaScript or TypeScript with Node.JS, React Native and the browser.
site.keywords: feathers, web, framework, nestjs, sails, loopback, server, websocket, application, client, API, Firebase, Parse, Horizon, real-time, backend, socket.io, typescript, javascript, sql, nosql, sql server, mysql, postgres, postgresql, mongo, mongodb, sqlite, sqllite, redis, nedb, mongoose, sequelize
